Amber Heard’s Father’s HORRIFIC Threat to Johnny Depp!

https://youtu.be/r1vQod8BJk4

One of the biggest Hollywood debacles going on right now is the rather ugly
divorce proceedings between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard. Still, it is pretty
difficult to say who’s right and who’s wrong, but it seems like Amber Heard is
far from winning. There is so much evidence against her. The whole world
considers her as a liar and now her father has been accused of threatening to
shoot Johnny Depp. How far can Amber Heard go for the money? And is it true
that her father was ab*sive towards her when she was a kid?
Make sure you stay till the end to figure out the real reason for Amber Heard’s
father wanting to kill Johnny Depp.
But before we start with Amber Heard’s father threatens to kill Johnny Depp,
let’s got back to 2020 to see the whole picture which shows that being agressive
and violent towards people is not something which happens for the first time in
Amber Heard’s family. Back in 2020 the actress revealed to a UK court that she
previously witnessed violence at home growing up and said that Johnny Depp
“makes dad look like a saint when he falls off the wagon”.
Amber Heard told the court that her father, David, “struggled with alcohol and
drug abuse issues his whole life.” “He is an addict and an alcoholic and he was
very violent but I love him very much,” she said.
Amber Heard said she reached out to her mom after one of Johnny Depp’s
alleged benders in March 2015 because she wanted “someone to talk to who
might understand first hand how it was.”
“My father was violent to my mother growing up,” Amber Heard told the court.
“They loved each other but he was very violent to her until the end ... she
passed away.”
Amber Heard told her mom the “Pirates of the Caribbean” actor was a
“madman” - but insisted he was not physically abusive with her. “It’s ok mom.
He’s not being violent with me. He’s just even raging in general,” she wrote.
The actress, however, denied in court that she was being truthful with her
mother, saying she “just didn’t want her to tell my dad.”

“I felt safe to tell my mother, but I didn’t know how my dad would react,” she
said. “I had never been in this situation before and I didn’t know if he would
react violently ... to Johnny.” And now. Here we are. It seems like Amber
Heard was absolutely right about her father because recently he was being
agressive towards Johnny Depp and there’s a witness who revealed the entire
situation. But before we start, make sure you hit the subscribe button to knoow
the most interesting information about celebrities’ lives.
So, how it all started. When it seemed as though things couldn’t get any worse,
there were some official reports saying that Johnny Depp was apparently being
threatened by Amber’s father, David Heard. According to a legal document, the
threats were overheard by a witness via a phone conversation in which her dad
made accusations that Johnny Depp was ruining his daughter’s career. Amber’s
father said about Johnny: “That f**ing piece of s**t is f**ing me too because
I’m supposed to get 10% of the money and without it I can’t produce the movie
I was gunna make!...He is ruining my baby girl’s career and blackballing her in
Hollywood”. Seems like the money is the biggest reason for the Heards to
attack Johnny Depp back and forth. The threat only seemed to escalate further
when guns were brought into the conversation, with David saying: “And when I
get to him I’m going to beat the s**t out of him...I’m from Texas, and men
from Texas carry 45’s and Johnny is going to meet the f**ing end of mine!”
So, what was going on there and who was the witness? According to the report,
David Killackey, the owner of Performance Allison Transmissions who worked
on both Amber and Johnny‘s classic cars, claimed that Amber became abusive
towards him and that her father made “death threats” towards Johnny in a phone
call.
...
And now I want to know your opinion. What do you think about Amber and her
family being agressive towards Johnny? Do you think is it possible that any
word or action will be taken against Amber Heard’s father? Let me know your
opinion in the comments section down below.
Thanks for watching this video and don’t forget to hit that subscribe button.
